title: Biden administration announces official end to Title 42, the Trump-era pandemic restrictions at the US border - CNN
content:
1. Biden administration announces official end to Title 42, the Trump-era pandemic restrictions at the US border  CNN
  2. Manchin calls Biden lifting Title 42 border policy 'frightening decision'  Fox News
  3. Biden to end Title 42, Arizona bracing for the fallout  ABC15 Arizona
  4. Biden just dug a border-sized pothole in Sen. Mark Kelly's path to re-election  The Arizona Republic
  5. 'A broken immigration system': Homeland security secretary defends ending Title 42  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The Biden administration will end Trump-era pandemic restrictions that effectively blocked migrants from entering the United States on May 23, the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention announced Friday.
